For detailed information about the Cloud Backup API, see the Cloud Backup Developer Guide at http://docs.rackspace.com/:
Support for Cloud Backup is available 24x7x365 via phone or chat, or you can also file a ticket.

chapter.title: Document Change History
chapter.para: This version of the release notes replaces and obsoletes all earlier versions. The most recent changes are described in the following table:

chapter.title: February 5, 2014
chapter.para: This release of the Cloud Backup API includes Role Based Access Control (RBAC).

Role Based Access Control (RBAC) restricts access to the capabilities of Rackspace Cloud services, including the Cloud Backup API, to authorized users only. RBAC enables Rackspace Cloud customers to specify which account users of their Cloud account have access to which Cloud Backup API service capabilities, based on roles defined by Rackspace. The permissions to perform certain operations in Cloud Backup API – create, read, update, delete – are assigned to specific roles, and these roles can be assigned by the Cloud account admin user to account users of the account.
For more information, see the section on RBAC in the Cloud Backup Developer Guide.
